intro: Hoffmannseggella flavasulina, commonly known as the yellow-flowered Hoffmannseggella, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its slender, erect stems and small, yellowish flowers arranged in umbels. The plant typically grows in moist, calcareous soils and is found in temperate regions of Europe. Its leaves are finely divided and have a distinctive aromatic scent. Hoffmannseggella flavasulina is often used in traditional herbal medicine for its potential health benefits.
